colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(CES RTEN LA GZUNGS GZHUG 'BUL TSUL SHEL DKAR ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI MDO RGYUD DANG 'PHAGS YUL GYI PAn GRUB KYI GZHUNG LAS RTEN LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING BSREL DANG GZUNGS SNGAGS 'GA' ZHIG GZHUG PAR BSHAD PA LAS GZUNGS GZHUG   'BUL TSUL RGYAS PAR BSHAD PA MA MTHONG KYANG BOD KYI BLA MA MANG POS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA SNA TSOGS 'DUG CING, KHYAD PAR PAn CHEN CHOS @019B KYI RGYAL POS MDZAD PA'I GZUNGS 'BUL NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA DANG, RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GIS MDZAD PA'I GZUNGS 'BUL 'KHRUL SPONG NYIN BYED GNYIS LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I MCHOG TU SNANG NA'ANG, SNGA MA HA CANG BSDUS GRAGS PA DANG, PHYI MA RGYAS DRAGS POS BLO DMAN DAG GIS GO DKAR BAR 'DUG PAS, GO BDE LA RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAM PA ZHIG GYIS ZHES DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, MKHAS DANG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG RJE PHA BONG KHA PA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA'I LEGS BSHAD DANG, GZHAN YANG YIG CHA DU MA DANG, RANG GI PHYAG LEN MTHONG BRGYUD RNAMS KYIS BRGYAN TE YAB SRAS KYI LEGS BSHAD GNYIS KYI ZUR BRGYAN DANG ZHABS TOGS SU DMIGS TE, YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR SKYES PA'I BCOL CHUNG GYI NA BA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL LAB KYI BOD CHOS LHA KHANG DU GRAGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SMON LAM RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOG PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
